title: Tabletop Game Companies Are Rushing to Snatch Up Hollywood Names
content: Free League Publishing has been transforming vast worlds into games: Alien, Lord of the Rings, and now Blade Runner. How does it work behind the scenes?
description: Free League Publishing has been transforming vast worlds into games: 'Alien,' 'Lord of the Rings,' and now 'Blade Runner.' How does it work behind the scenes?
